lines.text: to protect the underdog with nerve, knowledge, strength.

[dressed up like an adult, ordering a drink from a bar]
Umm, chocolate milk... On the rocks.
we have to swear in new members.

[pulling Drew to the side, whispering]
What about...

[interrupting, leaning over Miles and Drew]
... the G.I.R.L.?

[holding a container of Grey Poupon in front of a fan]
Stay back, or I'll Poupon you!
[laughs]
Get it? Poop-on-you?
Hey, you know what we're gonna do this weekend? We're gonna take the corporate jet, and we're gonna go squirrel hunting. You wanna come, Utley? Huh?
[taking a gun and aiming it at Utley's head]
A gun like this, almost shoots itself.

[nervously]
Wh-what's the sport in that?
It's the way I like it. Would you go back to work?
[points to his stuffed crow]
My bird hates your cologne.
The government sells to every Saddam, Dick, and Harry, why can't I?

I'm in Radio Shack heaven! Electronics, amps, transmitters, receivers, robotics, surveillance equipment! Can I borrow a few parts? I'm gonna come up with a science project to beat that Marty Spengler.
Lofty goal.
Who's the guy eatin' Styrofoam?
That would be Lanny.
Um, it's a rice cake. High in complex carbohydrates, uh, less than a gram of fat and uh, six grams of fiber. I just... thought you should know, you weren't even close.
And, uh, where'd you get this one, the weinie factory?
Excuse me! I have an IQ of 160.

[mockingly]
Oh really? Well I've got a calculator!
This is it. My dad's been sick for a while, so I've been picking up some of his repo jobs on the sly. I've tagged along so many of these, I can do 'em in my sleep.
Isn't this stealing?
Not if you don't pay your bills. See, you've got your master keys, your lockpicks, your right angle screwdrivers, your extractors, and of course, the modified slim jim.
If we get the Augmentor, can I enter it in the science fair?
Let's get it first, Miles, okay?
Can't you just see the look on Spengler's face when I unveil it?
You are such a nerd.
This is the bomb! We could sell this for a fortune!
Whoa Jonny, this is classified intelligence. I mean we should be camouflaging this.
Yo wouldn't it be phat we painted it like cherry red with flames?
It's an Augmentor, not a Camaro.
So what's your idea, wastoid?
Hey, wait, wait everybody! Knock it off you guys!
What are you looking at?
I don't know. Thought it was a girl, but uh, I'm open to suggestions.
I say we give up Samantha and Jonny like ugly stepkids. It's their their stinkin' prints muckin' up the works!

[fires a spitball at him]
Yeah right. We are not goin' down without our accomplices. We'll name names.
I told you she was trouble! She's evil!
We better crash at your guys' place for a while in case they come after us.
Oh sure. 'Hi Mom, Dad. This fourteen-year-old girl, she's just sleeping over tonight. Don't mind me, I'll be upstairs, in my room, *entering puberty*!' Are you nuts?

[to his stuffed bird]
See? We are ready. Don't peck Daddy, don't peck Daddy.

[being chased by a car]
Yo, Base, this is Drew! I've got a situation here! They're creeping up on me like a pair of lady's underwear. Any ideas?
